patterns: Is IBA Sukkur same as IBA Karachi?
do iba sukkur has any connection with iba karachi?
is sukkur iba a branch of iba karachi?
is sukkur iba affiliated with iba karachi?
responses: Sukkur IBA has no connection with IBA, Karachi in any terms, and the only thing they both share is the name else IBA, Karachi is totally separate entity and does not own nor has an affiliation with Sukkur IBA.

There are number of scholarships available which are awarded to needy students only and are based on the assessed need level. All students/applicants seeking financial assistance shall be facilitated on the basis of assessed need level.

patterns: what is the purpose of craib lab?
what is the work of carib lab?
responses: The aim of CRAIB is to train and educate the students, researchers, industry, academia, and entrepreneurs to produce human resource with critical analysis skills, creative thinking, and entrepreneurial spirit in the fields of robotics, artificial intelligence, and blockchain.

patterns: what is the meaning of qec?
what is the purpose of qec?
responses: Quality Enhancement Cell (QEC) is to improve the student learning experience through identifying specific areas for development. QEC encourage academic and support staff, and students collectively to share current good practice and to generate ideas and models for innovation in learning and teaching. The work of the Quality Enhancement Cell is planned and directed by the Quality Assurance Agency, Higher Education Commission (QAA-HEC) Pakistan. The cell at Sukkur IBA was established in June 2009 for enhancing quality of teaching and learning of various programmes of the Institute. The cell has started functioning successfully and progress has been documented and evaluated.

patterns: what is the purpose of data center?
what is the work of data center?
responses: This Data Center is conversion of old server rooms into Tier III standards / model. It will be first public sector University Data Center in which data and application will be hosted in secure environment. This Data Center is state-of-the-art modular, scalable and highly secure.

responses: there are 14 laboratories in sukkur iba

patterns: what is the purpose of fab lab?
what is the work of fab lab?
responses: it support different educational and research programs related with the multiple scales of the human habitat. It is the place to learn about the principles, applications and implications of digital manufacturing technology.

intents.tag: Office of Research, Innovation and Commercialization
patterns: what is Office of Research, Innovation and Commercialization
what is full form of oric?
what is the purpose of oric?
responses: The Office of Research, Sukkur IBA (ORIC) provides strategic and operational support to all research activities/program at the campus and has a central role in facilitating the University-Industry linkages for commercialization of research. Research at higher educational institutes, such as universities and research and policy making institutes drives the economy of any nation by building strong ties between academia and industry. One such collaborative platform has been established at Sukkur IBA in the name of Office of Research, Innovation and Commercialization abbreviated as ORIC. ORIC has mandate to enhance and promote the environment of research at Sukkur IBA.

patterns: what is the mission of sukkur IBA?
responses: The mission of Sukkur IBA is to contribute and serve community by imparting knowledge through innovative teaching and applied research at the global levels of excellence. We aim to establish and sustain a competitive meritorious environment by strengthening faculty and using state-of-the-art technology to produce graduates with analytical & creative thinking, leadership skills and entrepreneurial spirit, who possess global outlook and are conscious of ethical values.

patterns: how many tests iba conducts per year?
responses:
Sukkur IBA conducts 4 tests per year 
 NTHP test 
 STHP test 
 foundation test 
 Direct test

patterns: what is the purpose of edc?
what is the work of edc?
what is the full form of edc?
responses: To assist business organization through consultancy and executive education, Sukkur IBA established Executive Development Center in 2013, to provide technical and managerial skills development training programme to corporate sector as well as public sector employees.

patterns: what are the office timings of sukkur iba university?
responses: the official office timing is 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM

patterns: do iba provide any hostel facilities for students?
do sukkur iba have accomodation facilities for students?
responses: Sukkur IBA offer on the campus accommodation facility to the male and female students, faculty and staff of the institute. The hostel rooms provided are well equipped with all facilities important for a comfortable living.
